ExampleDefinition.ToolTipDescription: Shows how to create chart with shifted X and Y axes
ExampleDefinition.Description:
Demonstrates how to place X and Y Axes at the Center of the SciChartSurface using our ShiftedAxesBehavior.
ShiftedAxesBehavior allows to place Axis centrally which is common in Oscilloscope and VDU displays.
